Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Maureen A Enos
Reviews.Content: Got this bundle for my daughter as a Christmas gift, and she is thrilled with it!  Lots of accessories, everything she needs!

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: frank umstead "rev"
Reviews.Content: my old camera is dying and wanted to update the camera . This camera and equipment was way past what I could do , now I am very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Priscilla
Reviews.Content: Great price for what this came with. Not too complicated and you can just keep it on auto if you don't want to worry. Love It!!!

Reviews.Title: excellent camera at a great price.
Reviews.Author: AK from Trinidad
Reviews.Content: Took a photo with maximum zoom of someone 300 feet away and the picture was amazingly clear, looks as though it was taken 10 feet away.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 11 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video - Red (import, backed by Hot Deals Electronics 1 year guarantee)
4 AA High Capacity 2950mah Batteries with Rapid Charger - 16 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader
Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets, & Neck Strap - Universal Memory Card Wallet
HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection - Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - Quality Fiber Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens & HD Video - Red (Import) + 4 AA Batteries with Charger + 9pc Bundle 16GB Accessory Kit
